title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 151-2.12 - Discipline
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 151-2.12 - Discipline

State Regulations
(a) For the purpose
of this section, corporal punishment means any act of physical force upon a
child for the purpose of punishing that child, as defined in section
19.3
of this Title. (b) The program shall establish, and inform
all parents and staff of a written pupil discipline policy. Such policy shall
include the following: (1)
any discipline
used must relate to the child's misbehavior and be handled without prolonged
delay on the part of the staff; (2)
room isolation is prohibited; (3)
corporal punishment is prohibited; and
(4)
denial of food is prohibited. Notes
